cobblemon.species.leafeevee.name: Eevee
cobblemon.species.leafeevee.desc1: It's said that the outfit this Eevee wears gives it increased strength, although scientists have not figured out how.
cobblemon.species.leafeevee.desc2: This Eevee's bond with its trainer is special, to the point where the Eevee refuses to evolve.
cobblemon.species.redeevee.name: Eevee
cobblemon.species.redeevee.desc1: Another outfit that Eevee can wear, it gives the Eevee increased strength comparable to any other outfit.
cobblemon.species.redeevee.desc2: The increased strength allows Eevee to move entire Rhyhorns, although this phenomenon hasn't been spotted in action.
cobblemon.species.fleevee.name: Eevee
cobblemon.species.fleevee.desc1: The spinning petals that make up the rim of its hat feel like hard punches when they're spinning, and can cause bruising if not careful.
cobblemon.species.fleevee.desc2: The special necklace that the Eevee wears gives it a new fighting secondary typing.
cobblemon.species.cyeevee.name: Eevee
cobblemon.species.cyeevee.desc1: Despite its undying love for its trainer, sometimes this Eevee enjoys taking strolls on its own.
cobblemon.species.cyeevee.desc2: It's a cyan outfit for Eevee, basically identical to the rest. What more do I need to say?
cobblemon.species.loeevee.name: Eevee
cobblemon.species.loeevee.desc1: The feathers on this Eevee's hat may be small, but they can create strong gusts of wind.
cobblemon.species.loeevee.desc2: The necklace around this Eevee's neck does not benefit it as of now, but will later in life...
cobblemon.species.lgeevee.name: Eevee
cobblemon.species.lgeevee.desc1: Though the outfit this Eevee wears resembles another, the Eevee actually made the outfit itself.
cobblemon.species.lgeevee.desc2: While the pokemon this outfit is based on just wants love, this Eevee wants all your candy :D
cobblemon.species.blueeevee.name: Eevee
cobblemon.species.blueeevee.desc1: This Eevee's properties are different than others, though no one can give a dinfinitive answer as to how.
cobblemon.species.blueeevee.desc2: Rumors say that this Eevee can travel between dimensions, and is just hanging out in its home dimension.
cobblemon.species.pinkeevee.name: Eevee
cobblemon.species.pinkeevee.desc1: This Eevee colored all over its costume, trying to make it look like another pokemon, but made it look like something else.
cobblemon.species.yeleevee.name: Eevee
cobblemon.species.yeleevee.desc1: This Eevee used permanent marker to create a costume of one of its best friends.
cobblemon.species.yeleevee.desc2: It's said that this eevee has elecrtic capabilities. However, that is a lie.
cobblemon.species.greevee.name: Eevee
cobblemon.species.greevee.desc1: This Eevee tries to look scary with its costume of Rayquaza, but sort of fails.
cobblemon.species.greevee.desc2: Despite the file name, this Eevee is NOT gravy!
